comment._content: I used to live in the cottage, the end building of the terrace facing towards the camera, in the lower right side of the screen

comment.author: 29295370@N07
comment._content: Hi there, I know its been a while since you posted the comment, but could you add a note to exactly where you mean by highlighting over the image where you lived?

comment.author: 46034804@N07
comment._content: " The Cottage" is marked on the Photograph

comment.author: 46034804@N07
comment._content: I believe "The Cottage" predated the Colliery. The were many "drift" mines just to the south. A stone quarry obliterated many of these, just off Benwell Lane.
